overview: Ivy, a maid of the Manor, is caught up in the turmoil's of three aristocratic siblings. She uncovers a plot to kill the youngest Adelaide, with pressure from the lady of the manor, Ivy is determined to protect her closest companion. Adelaide convinces Ivy to poison her two brothers, without much luck but as time passes by, we learn all is not as it seems in their relationship.Â Glimpses into the past reveal dark secrets about the family.
title: Poison Ivy
